What features of this product appeal to: As a small business owner, I appreciate the flexibility of the contribution options and the ability to set personalized savings goals. The fact that there are no monthly fees or minimum balance requirements is also a big plus for me. And of course, the competitive interest rates are always attractive.

What concerns do you have about using th: One concern I have is whether the interest rates will remain competitive in the long run. I also wonder if there are any penalties for withdrawing money before reaching my savings goals. Additionally, I would like to know more about the security measures in place to protect my account information.

Is there anything missing from this prod: One thing that would make me more likely to use this product is if there were additional incentives for reaching my savings goals, such as cash bonuses or discounts on other financial products. It would also be helpful if there were resources available to help me create and stick to a realistic savings plan.

How easy or difficult do you think it wo: Based on the product features and mechanics, I think it would be relatively easy to use this product. The flexible contribution options and personalized savings goals make it easy to customize the account to my needs, and the mobile app and online banking tools would make it easy to track my progress towards my goals. Overall, I would rate the ease of use as an 8 out of 10.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As a small business owner who values saving and setting financial goals, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for this product as a 9 out of 10. The features and benefits align with my personal financial goals and the lack of fees and minimum balance requirements are very appealing.

As someone who values financial stability and smart saving, I would rate my likelihood of recommending this product to a friend as a 8 out of 10. The product features and benefits are attractive, but I would want to see how the interest rates hold up over time before fully recommending it to others.

What other suggestions or feedback do yo: One suggestion I have for improving this product is to offer more guidance and resources for setting and achieving savings goals. This could include financial planning tools, educational resources, and personalized advice from financial experts. Additionally, it would be helpful if the credit union could provide more transparency around how the interest rates are calculated and how they compare to other savings accounts on the market. Finally, it would be great to see more options for accessing and managing the account, such as in-person support at local branches or additional mobile app features.
